pages.title: Mo XiaoYu
pages.text: .NET Programmer / .NET软件开发工程师 Gender：Male Mail：danvic96@hotmail.com Graduated School：AnHui Institute of Information Technology / School of Computer and Software Engineering / Network Engineering（2014/09 - 2018/06） Work Place：Hefei, Anhui, China Who AM I / 我是谁 Born in 1996, growing up in a fourth-tier city in Anhui China, Graduated from Top 10000000 school. A .NET programmer and a gooner, like cat so much. Started the .NET programmer career in December 2016, A firm adherence to Microsoft .NET technology. Hope to be the most powerful programmer for Google-Oriented Programming which raise cat in internet. Skill Tree / 技能树 Familiar with B/S development under .NET platform with C#, familiar with ASP.NET Core development Familiar with sql programming of SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL Familiar with front-end development skills such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript / Jquery, Boostrap, Vue Writing of documents during software development

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: I heard the most beautiful story,It’s the princess who’s dead, the dragon slayer’s teenager is still burning.The bloody teenager,The immature’s love，the death and dream.Such a good story. Don’t interpret it. — The ridiculous teenager · Zhu Xuan
